response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is estimated at $15,000. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $12,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between value and cost. This opportunity not only presents an excellent investment for your business but also allows you to leverage the product's unique features to achieve greater success. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
